channel.title: [NEW] 317 | Dicing | Nex | Dungeoneering | LOOKING FOR STAFF | 10GB RAM VPS | 24
channel.description:
[URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc/client.jar"]Client Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc/client.php"]Webclient[/URL]
Two powerful servers have collapsed a long time ago, leaving countless players without a home server. Including myself. I was looking for a new server to join, however, I couldn't find one which would fit my standards. So I decided to create my own.
Welcome to Vengeance-PK-REBORN!
The server has loads of features and is hosted on a powerful VPS, 10GB of RAM, 0 lagg and 24/7 uptime. The server is fresh, meaning that we are looking for staff.
We are currently looking for staff! However, this doesn't mean that if you join, you'll immediately be promoted. No, you need to first prove you're worthy of being promoted.
We are also looking for:
-a coding advisor -a website development advisor -an assistant coder -an assistant web developer -an advertiser that will be payed
If you wish to apply for any of the positions above, talk to Aleyasu (myself) either in-game or on Vengeance-Pk forums.
Virus scan:
[URL=http://img641.imageshack.us/i/34267672.jpg/][IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/6766/34267672.jpg[/img][/URL]
features include: -working armor sets -you can set your combat skill levels -ip board forums -online store, you automaticay receive items in-game - dicing - working nex armour with effects - working nex boss - completitionist cape with a special effect -all emotes work -all skills work - easy to obtain chaotics, 1hour maximum - PKing is highly rewarded with pk points, which are used to buy incredible rewards in PKP shops, such as torva, partyhats, korasi, chaotics, primal, etc. - dungeoneering with rs-like rewards such as chaotics, vigour, and a few dungeoeering armors such as primal, promethium... - fully working slayer system with points -automatic donation system - donator zone, you're able to buy all pvp armors and some other items using gp - in the donator zone are special stalls with double the rewards than normal - donator zone includes portals to bosses with double the chances of getting drops and a unique minigame and places which can be only accessed by donators. - a unique gambling boss at the donator zone
If you want to find out the rest of the features, join the server!
[URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc/client.jar"]Client Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.vengeancepk.cu.cc/client.php"]Webclient[/URL]

@Googa wrote:

Website
Client Download

Two powerful servers have collapsed a long time ago, leaving countless players without a home server. Including myself. I was looking for a new server to join, however, I couldn’t find one which would fit my standards. So I decided to create my own.

Welcome to Vengeance-PK-REBORN!

The server has loads of features and is hosted on a powerful VPS, 10GB of RAM, 0 lagg and 24/7 uptime. The server is fresh, meaning that we are looking for staff.

We are currently looking for staff! However, this doesn’t mean that if you join, you’ll immediately be promoted. No, you need to first prove you’re worthy of being promoted.

We are also looking for:

-a coding advisor
-a website development advisor
-an assistant coder
-an assistant web developer
-an advertiser that will be payed

If you wish to apply for any of the positions above, talk to Aleyasu (myself) either in-game or on Vengeance-Pk forums.

Virus scan:

features include:
-working armor sets
-you can set your combat skill levels
-ip board forums
-online store, you automaticay receive items in-game

  • dicing
  • working nex armour with effects
  • working nex boss
  • completitionist cape with a special effect
    -all emotes work
    -all skills work
  • easy to obtain chaotics, 1hour maximum
  • PKing is highly rewarded with pk points, which are used to buy incredible rewards in PKP shops, such as torva, partyhats, korasi, chaotics, primal, etc.
  • dungeoneering with rs-like rewards such as chaotics, vigour, and a few dungeoeering armors such as primal, promethium…
  • fully working slayer system with points
    -automatic donation system
  • donator zone, you’re able to buy all pvp armors and some other items using gp
  • in the donator zone are special stalls with double the rewards than normal
  • donator zone includes portals to bosses with double the chances of getting drops and a unique minigame and places which can be only accessed by donators.
  • a unique gambling boss at the donator zone

If you want to find out the rest of the features, join the server!
